mapper.select: select nid,pid,deviceNum,val,DATE_FORMAT(updateTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as updateTime from db_sensornowdata where deviceNum = #{deviceNum}

SELECT nid,val,nupdateTime,pid,projectName,projectAddress,log,lat,projectInfo,projectImg,pcreateTime,did,s.sensorName as deviceName,deviceNum,deviceDes,dcreateTime from (select n.nid,n.val,DATE_FORMAT(n.updateTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as nupdateTime, p.pid,p.projectName,p.projectAddress,p.log,p.lat,p.projectInfo,p.projectImg,DATE_FORMAT(p.createTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as pcreateTime, d.did,d.deviceName,d.deviceNum,d.deviceDes,DATE_FORMAT(d.createTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as dcreateTime from db_sensornowdata n left join db_project p on n.pid = p.pid left join db_deviceinfo d on n.deviceNum = d.deviceNum) nd ,db_sensorinfo s WHERE nd.deviceName=s.sensid
order by nid desc

SELECT count(*)from (select n.nid,n.val,DATE_FORMAT(n.updateTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as nupdateTime, p.pid,p.projectName,p.projectAddress,p.log,p.lat,p.projectInfo,p.projectImg,DATE_FORMAT(p.createTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as pcreateTime, d.did,d.deviceName,d.deviceNum,d.deviceDes,DATE_FORMAT(d.createTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as dcreateTime from db_sensornowdata n left join db_project p on n.pid = p.pid left join db_deviceinfo d on n.deviceNum = d.deviceNum) nd ,db_sensorinfo s WHERE nd.deviceName=s.sensid and s.sensorName=#{deviceName}
